verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* conferred \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* thousands.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w proposal|strong="H1697"\w* \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w right|strong="H3474"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w agreed|strong="H3474"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w River|strong="H5704"\w* \w Shihor|strong="H7883"\w* \f + \fr 13:5 \ft Hebrew from the Shihor\f* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Lebo-hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w bring|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H4480"\w* God \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Kiriath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* (\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Kiriath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*) \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w enthroned|strong="H3427"\w* \w between|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 13:6 \ft Or the ark of God, which is called by the Name of the LORD who is enthroned between the cherubim; or the ark of God, the LORD, who is enthroned between the cherubim, where His Name is called\f*

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w carried|strong="H7392"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Abinadab \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* Ahio \w guiding|strong="H5090"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*. Uzzah Touches the Ark (2 Samuel 6:5–11)

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w celebrating|strong="H7832"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w might|strong="H5797"\w*, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w tambourines|strong="H8596"\w*, \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* came \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w threshing|strong="H1637"\w* \w floor|strong="H1637"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Chidon|strong="H3592"\w*,\f + \fr 13:9 \ft Chidon is a variant of Nacon; see 2 Samuel 6:6.\f* \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w* \w reached|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w took|strong="H3027"\w* hold \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ark, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w stumbled|strong="H8058"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w anger|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* burst \w forth|strong="H6555"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w*; \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Perez-uzzah|strong="H6560"\w*,\f + \fr 13:11 \ft Perez-uzzah means outbreak against Uzzah.\f* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* God \w and|strong="H3117"\w* asked, “\w How|strong="H1963"\w* can \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w ever|strong="H3117"\w* \w bring|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3372"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w move|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* ark \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; \w instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \w it|strong="H5186"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*.

Thus \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* owned.
